scripts.build:en: cp script.js style.css ./en/ && mustache -p mustache_templates/navPartial.mustache mustache_templates/view.json mustache_templates/index.mustache > en/index.html
scripts.build:zh: cp script.js style.css ./zh/ && mustache -p mustache_templates/navPartial.mustache mustache_templates/viewZh.json mustache_templates/index.mustache > zh/index.html
scripts.build:all: mustache -p mustache_templates/navPartial.mustache mustache_templates/view.json mustache_templates/index.mustache > index.html && cp script.js style.css ./zh/ && mustache -p mustache_templates/navPartial.mustache mustache_templates/viewZh.json mustache_templates/index.mustache > zh/index.html
